name: The Old Guard's Respect
description: An old-school legend returns from prison and ignores Tony's authority.
context: Feech La Manna just got out of prison after 20 years. He was a feared captain in your father's eraâ€”a legend. You gave him a piece of a landscaping operation as a welcome-back gesture. Since then, he's been taking more than his share, moving in on other captains' territories without permission, and dismissing your authority. He knew you when you were a kid and doesn't seem to recognize you as boss. He's on parole.
prompt: Feech is ignoring your orders and taking what he wants. He's well-respected by the old guard. He's also on parole. What do you do?
stakes: If you act harshly, the old-timers may resent it. If you don't, other captains see they can ignore you too.
